StringTable.Label: ResearchCharge_Dec
StringTable.String: An archive of nearly limitless knowledge. By activating it we can instantly complete our current research. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Complete Current Research[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: SocialConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Able to produce anything we need. Activating it allows us to make instant progress on a selected planet's social project. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+100 Planet Production[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: MilitaryConstruction_Dec
StringTable.String: Remnant of an ancient race of slavers. When activated it inspires productivity and boosts production at the selected shipyard. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+500 Shipyard Production[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: PlanetInfluence_Dec
StringTable.String: A shard from the heart of creation. Activating it significantly increases the influence of the selected planet. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+500 Influence[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: PlanetClass_Dec
StringTable.String: This artifact produces material rich with proto-organic matter. This matter can improve the class of any world we use it on. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+2 Usable Tiles, +1 Farming[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FleetRepair_Dec
StringTable.String: These nanites will immediately rebuild themselves according to the architectural records of the ship they are exposed to. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Fully Repairs Fleet[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FleetResetMoves_Dec
StringTable.String: Extra-dimensional materials are consumed quickly, but will give a temporary boost the movement of a fleet. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Resets Fleet Moves[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FleetAttack_Dec
StringTable.String: This ruined Arnor weapon can be harvested for power sources that will improve the attack of the selected fleet. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+3 Attack[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FleetExp_Dec
StringTable.String: By bonding our command staff to the ship itself we can create a fleet that is more responsive and reactive than our enemies. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+10 Experience Points[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FleetDefense_Dec
StringTable.String: Folding materials across dimensions produces plating stronger than physics would allow, increasing the defense of the selected fleet. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight] +15 Defense[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FleetHitpoints_Dec
StringTable.String: Activating this symbol of the Arnor will apply some measure of this permanence to the selected fleet, increasing its hit points. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+25% Hit Points[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Wormhole_Dec
StringTable.String: This former part of a galactic relay lies dormant. Activating it will send a selected fleet somewhere, but we have no control over where. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Randomly Teleport Fleet[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FOWReveal_Dec
StringTable.String: This Precursor artifact was left here for unknown reasons. It allows us to see a given area of space in great detail. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Reveal an Area of the Map[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FleetDamage_Dec
StringTable.String: Able to warp space with a beam capable of inflicting heavy damage on an entire enemy fleet. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]25% Damage[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: SpawnOverlord_Dec
StringTable.String: Able to transmit a stream of nanites to any part of the galaxy and instantly construct a warship. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Spawn an Overlord ship[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: CagedMonster_Dec
StringTable.String: A creature was forced out of another dimension and trapped in ours. We could release it, but it may go after us as well. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Spawn a minor Space Monster[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: SpaceMonster_Dec
StringTable.String: This beacon will call a monster from distant space. But beware, it doesn't grant any control over the monster. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Spawn a powerful Space Monster[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: PlanetPopulation_Dec
StringTable.String: This self-sustaining habitat can be deployed on any planet and comes complete with a synthetic workforce. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1 Yor Citizen[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: GlobalApproval_Dec
StringTable.String: This device is capable of transmitting a calming wave over all of our worlds. Though its influence is temporary. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+25% Approval for 25 turns[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: PlanetResistance_Dec
StringTable.String: This quantum sensor warns of threats before there is any known indication of their presence. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+10% Resistance[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: ConvertDeadWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: An entire ecosystem is contained within this sphere. By deploying it to dead worlds, the entire world will come alive. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Convert a Dead World to a Class 5 Planet[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: PlanetCrime_Dec
StringTable.String: Reduces the [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Approval[/COLOR] of the target world for 25 turns. Permanently increases the worlds [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Crime[/COLOR].

StringTable.Label: PlanetPollution_Dec
StringTable.String: Capable of filtering an entire planet's atmosphere. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-20% Pollution[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: GalacticFestival_Dec
StringTable.String: Holding a grand festival on all of our worlds will improve our [HS=HS_Tourism]Tourism[/HS] for 25 turns.

StringTable.Label: Draft1Colonists_Dec
StringTable.String: Sometimes we can't afford to wait for volunteers. This will provide a free Colony ship.

StringTable.Label: Draft2Colonists_Dec
StringTable.String: Sometimes we can't afford to wait for volunteers. This will provide 2 free Colony ships.

StringTable.Label: Draft3Colonists_Dec
StringTable.String: Sometimes we can't afford to wait for volunteers. This will provide 3 free Colony ships.

StringTable.Label: MartialLaw_Dec
StringTable.String: Improves your [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] and reduces [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] and [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] for 50 turns.

StringTable.Label: IllicitDeals_Dec
StringTable.String: There are those that want our favor, and are happy to pay for it. This will provide Credits but increase [HS=HS_Crime]Crime[/HS] across our civilization.

StringTable.Label: PrintMoney_Dec
StringTable.String: Printing money can provide short-term wealth at the cost of inflation which lowers approval for a few months

StringTable.Label: ExploitNature_Dec
StringTable.String: In times of need we can exploit government land of all their resources. This will create a significant pollution problem for a full year.

StringTable.Label: ExhortGovernors_Dec
StringTable.String: Our governors will generously donate to our cause. But they won't like it. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Provides 100 Credits per Governor[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: InviteLeaders_Dec
StringTable.String: Searching for our most talented will provide 3 new leaders for recruitment.

StringTable.Label: InviteLeadersFeast_Dec
StringTable.String: Inviting our most talented while providing a feast to impress them will provide 4 new leaders for recruitment.

StringTable.Label: InviteLeadersLavishFeast_Dec
StringTable.String: Inviting our most talented while providing a lavish feast with no expenses spared to impress them will provide 4 new leaders for recruitment.

StringTable.Label: CallElection_Dec
StringTable.String: Reform your government into one which offers increased bonuses, but will also increase your citizen's [HS=HS_Expectations]Expectations[/HS].

StringTable.Label: ColonialSupplies_Dec
StringTable.String: Making a large shipment of supplies to our colonies will boost their [HS=HS_ColonyDecay]Decay[/HS] for 25 turns.

StringTable.Label: PressureScientists_Dec
StringTable.String: Putting pressure on our scientists will result in an immediate +50 [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS].

StringTable.Label: TelescopeTakeover_Dec
StringTable.String: Private corporations have advanced survey equipment which we can put to immediate use. Costs the equivalent of 12.5% of our economic power in credits. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Reveals an area of the map[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DraftCivilianShips_Dec
StringTable.String: Security is more important than private ownership. This will provide three free defenders.

StringTable.Label: GoodWillTour_Dec
StringTable.String: Go on a Good Will Tour to improve your Diplomacy with foreign civilizations. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1 Diplomacy for 30 turns[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: ForcedOvertime_Dec
StringTable.String: More work gets done at the targeted shipyard, but your citizens won't be happy.

StringTable.Label: DefenseSentinels_Artifact_Dec
StringTable.String: Provides a guardian drone for the selected colony. Defense drones can protect against minor attacks but can't leave the planet.

StringTable.Label: QuestArtifact_OrbOfDraginol_Artifact_Dec
StringTable.String: An artifact with the power to open a pocket universe where the Orb of Draginol is said to be hidden.

StringTable.Label: ImpressForeignFleet_Dec
StringTable.String: Take control of another civilizations fleet that is within your borders. Cannot be used on fleets you are at war with.
